title: Animal Crossing: New Horizons will save us all!
description: This week, the Besties discuss the highly anticipated Animal Crossing: New Horizons! Is this the most important game possibly in the history of humanity? Will this be the biggest game release on the Nintendo Switch of all time? Together they explore the game play, bug curation and how important the opportunity to virtually go outside is in the this time of the coronavirus.
author: thebestiesbizemail@gmail.com (The Besties)
